name: VR - Drive Valley JET SKI Simulator
name_original: VR - Drive Valley JET SKI Simulator
description:
Drive Valley JETSKI Simulator is a free game for skiing lovers. Let's experience a real jet ski safari today and simulate your driving with smooth control of a variety of powerboats around a beautiful valley with realistic graphics and stunning sound effects. Drive your jet ski and collect all the coins. Caution ! Avoid to hurt your jet ski with hurdles and a rocks of mountain. Have a safe jetski safari. Drive Valley JETSKI Simulator not only simulate your driving skills but also give you a chance to ride your powerboat in a deep ocean with high speed by collecting more and more powerups. Collect magnetic force to pull all the coins towards your boat. An accelerator will help you to drive fast to simulate your riding experience and give you a real fun of driving over the island. So let's download this game today and experience a most fantastic simulating journey with a pack of joy ride.
Feature
Real simulation of skiing over a valley.
Smooth control ski riding experience.
HD graphics with beautiful oriented environment.
Elegant sound effects to vibrant a mind.
Energetic simulating effects to make you addicted with graphics.
Enjoy a free ride with a plenty of power ups.
